chapters.title: Prologue: Glimmers of the Pattern
chapters.info: Corgaide Marendevin, p. 76 (77)—Pale, grave-faced, gray-haired woman who orders servants in the Sun Palace. Her official title is Holder of the Keys, and she is essentially in charge of all servants in the palace. She is about a hand shorter than Samitsu and Sashalle. She is fond of rumors.
